mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.date AS "date", a.content AS "content", a.situation AS "situation", a.measure AS "measure", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_org_id AS "createOrgId", a.create_id_no AS "createIdNo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_org_id AS "updateOrgId", a.update_id_no AS "updateIdNo", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = a.create_org_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO affair_security_check( id, date, content, situation, measure, remark, create_by, create_org_id, create_id_no, create_date, update_by, update_org_id, update_id_no, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{date}, #{content}, #{situation}, #{measure}, #{remark}, #{createBy.id}, #{createBy.office.id}, #{createIdNo}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateBy.office.id}, #{updateIdNo}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE affair_security_check SET date = #{date}, content = #{content}, situation = #{situation}, measure = #{measure}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_org_id = #{updateBy.office.id}, update_id_no = #{updateIdNo}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
